directions: Combine tomatoes, scallions, jalapeño, corn, and lime juice in a medium bowl. Season with salt. Using a fork, gently smash avocado slices evenly onto each toast. Top each generously with tomato-corn salsa.
ingredients: 1 cup fresh corn kernels (from about 2 cobs)
4 tablespoons fresh lime juice (from about 2 limes)
6 slices crusty white bread (such as country bread), toasted
title: Avocado Toast with Tomato-Corn Salsa
